paper_abstract: Recently, many standard families of distributions have been generalized by exponentiating their cumulative distribution function (CDF). In this paper, test statistics are constructed based on CDF-transformed observations and the corresponding moments of arbitrary positive order. Simulation results for generalized exponential distributions show that the proposed test compares well with standard methods based on the empirical distribution function.
paper_title: Tests for generalized exponential laws based on the empirical Mellin transform
